data.name: BuyOrSellDescription
data.value: Discover how to safely buy or sell luxury items

data.name: BuyOrSellDetails
data.value: We connect buyers and sellers of premium artworks, jewelry, watches and antiques with quality and safety guarantee.

data.name: HowToBuySellDescription
data.value: Complete guide to buying and selling with Aristocratic Artwork Sale

data.name: HowToBuyStep1Text
data.value: Explore our curated collection of luxury items. Each piece is carefully verified and documented.

data.name: HowToBuyStep2Text
data.value: Click the "I'm Interested" button on your selected item. Fill out the form and we'll connect you with the seller.

data.name: HowToBuyStep3Text
data.value: Through us, you communicate with the seller, arrange viewing and all transaction details.

data.name: HowToBuyStep4Text
data.value: We ensure secure transaction process, item authentication and all necessary documents.

data.name: HowToBuyNote
data.value: For items marked with AAS icon, we guarantee authenticity and provenance.

data.name: HowToSellStep1Text
data.value: Send us an email at info@aristocraticartworksale.com with photos and details of your item.

data.name: HowToSellStep2Text
data.value: Our team of experts will assess your item and propose pricing and selling method.

data.name: HowToSellStep3Text
data.value: Upon agreement, we'll create a professional listing with photos and description of your item.

data.name: HowToSellStep4Text
data.value: We'll arrange contact with buyer and handle the transaction. Our commission is agreed upfront and fair.

data.name: HowToSellNote
data.value: We specialize in art, jewelry, watches and antiques. Contact us even with unusual items.

data.name: WhatIsAASVerified
data.value: What does the AAS Verified icon mean?

data.name: AASVerifiedExplanation
data.value: The AAS Verified icon identifies items for which Aristocratic Artwork Sale personally guarantees authenticity and provenance.

data.name: WithAASVerifiedText
data.value: Aristocratic Artwork Sale personally guarantees the item's authenticity. It has passed our thorough verification and you have certainty of authenticity.

data.name: WithoutAASVerifiedText
data.value: Item is offered by seller without our authenticity guarantee. We recommend own verification or expert appraisal.

data.name: AASVerifiedDisclaimer
data.value: AAS Verified icon is our company's guarantee that the item is authentic and matches the description. For other items, authenticity responsibility lies with the seller.
